hero.title: Portfolio
hero.description: Focussed on learning new things and Exploring the world of software. Always in for a new challenge!

about.title: Hello, I am Sean!
about.description: I am a junior developer with a strong interest in software engineering. I am eager to learn new things, wether it is related to my job or something entirely else. If you want to cooperate don't hesistate to contact me!

career.title: Career
career.mehrwerk-description: First hands on experience in IT and software development. I learned about the structure of a software company and how to work in a team.
career.staatsanwaltschaft-description: At the public prosecutor's office i learned how important precise wording is. First experience with legal documents and how to write those.
career.pit_2024-description-1: I participated in a hackathon organized by PIT (Paderborn ist Informatik). The event focused on developing innovative solutions for real-world problems.
career.pit_2024-description-2: I collaborated with other participants to develop a software solution for a specific challenge over a weekend. This experience improved my problem-solving skills and allowed me to apply my knowledge in a practical setting.
career.bib-description-1: Currently enrolled in a software engineering program at b.i.b. International College. The program focuses on practical applications of software development, including programming, project management, and teamwork.
career.bib-description-2: I am gaining valuable skills and knowledge that will prepare me for a successful career in the software industry. Apprentice Software Engineering at Hörmann.
career.hoermann-description-1: Currently in my apprenticeship as a software engineer at Hörmann. I am learning how to develop software in a professional environment, working with various technologies and methodologies.
career.hoermann-description-2: Automation and optimization of processes are central aspects of my work. I have also gained first experiences with ERP systems like SAP.

experience.title: The technologies I have experience with:

projects.title: Projects
projects.thouChat-description-1: A chat application built with React, TypeScript and C# over a weekend. It allows users to create accounts, join chat rooms, and send messages in real-time with a catch. Via a switch the user sends his messages in a shakespearean style.
projects.thouChat-description-2: This was my first time working with web sockets and in a larger team of young developers. I also learned how to present my work to a larger audience and showcase its features.
projects.macroForge-description-1: MacroForge is a macro recorder and editor for Windows, built with C# and WPF. It allows users to record their mouse and keyboard actions and replay them later. The project was a great opportunity to learn about Windows API, event handling, and user interface design.
projects.macroForge-description-2: I learned how to work with the Windows API to capture mouse and keyboard events, as well as how to create a user-friendly interface using WPF. The project also taught me about the importance of testing and debugging in software development.
projects.skatfreunde-description-1: Skatfreunde Jöllenbeck is a website built with React, TypeScript, and C#. It serves as a platform for the local Skat club to manage their members, events, and scores. The project was a great opportunity to learn about full-stack development and how to build a web application from scratch.
projects.skatfreunde-description-2: I learned how to work with REST APIs, manage state in React, and how to deploy a web application using Node.js. The project also taught me about the importance of user experience and how to create a responsive design.
